nodes.text: Valons were the inhabitants of the planet Valo. They consisted of members of multiple species, including humans. Jedi Padawan Ram Jomaram was Valon. Ear cuffs were a traditional Valon adornment.

Valons first appeared in the novels The High Republic: The Rising Storm and The High Republic: Race to Crashpoint Tower. A preview of Race to Crashpoint Tower published in The High Republic: A Test of Courage used the demonym "Valorian" instead.
